item.title: about
item.description: Hi! I’m senior games programmer with over a decade of experience. I’ve covered engine development, animation systems, VR, back + front end web dev, management and more. I truly love making things. It’s good for the soul. I’ve been involved in game jams, one in particular won Ludum Dare 54 - Stretchmancer which we’re expanding into a full game! I studied physics and programming before joining the industry and have spent the bulk of my time at Frontier.
